required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Validation Study of The Relationship Between ALDH2 and Aortic Dissection
clinical_study.official_title: A Validation Study of The Relationship Between ALDH2 and Aortic Dissection

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to validate the impact of ALDH2 Glu504Lys polymorphism on aortic dissection.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with different ALDH2 genotype
primary_outcome.description: DNA was extracted from venous blood;genomic DNA underwent PCR amplification; finally, PCR products were purified and directly sequenced by Invitrogen Corp or Biosune Corp.Then ALDH2 genotype was distinguished depend on a G-to-A missense mutation on exon 12 of ALDH2 gene.

arm_group.description: Chinese Han people to do physical examination in physical examination center of Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital
Chinese Han people diagnosed with aortic dissection in Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital

biospec_descr.textblock: 4 ml vein blood samples were collected from aortic dissection or controls in tubes containing EDTA. The samples would be centrifuged and saved in a -80â„ƒ ultra-low temperature refrigerator.

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with aortic dissection in Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Chinese Han people diagnosed with aortic dissection in Guangdong Provincial People's Hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Aortic dissection based on trauma, connective tissue diseases and pregnancy
- Patients with tumor
- Patients with no written consensus
